name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add rum and top with soda water. Garnish with mint sprig and lime slice.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Muddle sugar cube and bitters with a splash of water. Add whiskey and ice. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Manhattan
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Gin and Tonic
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add gin and tonic water. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Negroni
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice. Strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Combine vodka and lime juice in a copper mug filled with ice. Top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Margarita
instructions: Salt the rim of a margarita glass if desired. Shake tequila, lime juice, and triple sec with ice. Strain into the prepared glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: White Russian
instructions: Pour coffee liqueur and vodka into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Float heavy cream on top and stir slowly if desired.

name: Shirley Temple
instructions: Fill a glass with ice. Add ginger ale and grenadine. Stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice if desired.
